prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Lewis Wingfield Temperance Bond, 26 April 1849. Accession 41346. Personal Papers Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Temperance bond, 26 April 1849, subscribed to by Lewis H. Wingfield of Stapleton, Amherst County, Virginia. Sent to A. N. Montgomery in Lynchburg, Virginia, along with a letter introducing the bond.
